name: BOLOGNA CENTRE APARTMENT W/ GARDEN
description:
Pratello Garden is a tourist apartment with all comforts in the center of Bologna. In addition to the private garden, the managers offer all their many years experience in the field of short-term rentals.
The street is cheerful and lively but you only notice it once you go out because the apartment is at the end of a quiet inner courtyard of a historic building.
neighborhood_overview:
The downtown neighborhood of "Pratello" is a neighborhood in the historic center but not very touristy, authentic, full of clubs and life.
More than a neighborhood, it's a state of mind.

"Via del Pratello" is street life, it is a pop enclave (but also rock, reggae and funky...) in the heart of a bourgeois historic center suffocated by showrooms and banks. In Pratello there are typical taverns and taverns, where you can eat something local or multi-ethnic and, above all, drink. The street is almost completely pedestrian.

During the day it looks like a small village for gentlemen who go shopping or students and is the meeting point for conversation and fun.

Via del Pratello is accompanied by a transgressive fame that, despite everything, it boasts. This street was previously in the countryside and hence its name "lawn".

In the 1970s, they were born at the Pratello Radio Alice and the film club L'Angelo Azzurro. Subsequently, it was the tur
host_about:
I was born in Bologna, then I lived in Paris, and then for four years I lived in Barcelona where I created, along with Sebastián Domínguez, Hippocampo Films, engaged in production of social documentaries, video promotion and cultural projects. After nearly four years in Spain I returned to Bologna where we opened "Pratello Garden", with my husband Sebastian, my mom and my sister. I have three little children, Leon, René and Milo that help us at Pratello Garden!
We love to travel and meet people from other places.

Sono nata a Bologna, ma ho vissuto a Parigi, e poi per quattro anni ho vissuto a Barcellona, dove ho creato, insieme a Sebastián Domínguez, Hippocampo Films, impegnata nella produzione di documentari sociali, la promozione di video e progetti culturali. Dopo quasi quattro anni in Spagna sono tornata a Bologna dove abbiamo aperto "Pratello Garden", con mio marito Sebastian, mia mamma e mia sorella. Ho tre bimbi, Leon,  René e Milo che ci aiutano a Pratello Garden! 
Ci piace viaggiare e incontrare persone provenienti da altri paesi.

name: Appartamento Santa Caterina centro storico WF AC
description:
Just a 12-minute walk from Piazza Maggiore, the Santa Caterina apartment, located in a typical Palazzo Vecchia Bologna, is a ground floor on two levels overlooking a beautiful courtyard.
On the ground floor, living room, bathroom and kitchen, equipped with utensils and appliances to cook. A comfortable staircase leads to the sleeping area.
Equipped with TV, DVD, wifi and air conditioning.
The location is ideal for visiting the city through the charming streets of the old town and its typical arcades.
neighborhood_overview:
The apartment is located in a charming street of the historic center in the Zaragoza district, a stone's throw from the renowned Palazzo Albergati, host to countless exhibitions of the best international art exponents of all time (from October 17 Duchamp, Magritte and Dalí, the revolutionaries of the 900).
Although the accommodation is located in a quiet area (guaranteed sleep) in the street there are two very renowned restaurants in Bologna and in the adjacent streets bars, wine bars and trendy clubs, frequented by locals, where you can spend a pleasant evening!
We are a 12-minute walk from Piazza Maggiore and therefore from the center of Bologna.
Ideal for those who like to discover cities with the best means of transport we have: the legs!
Lucky position also for those who want to reach the Sanctuary of the Madonna di San Luca and walk the longest porch in the world (3,796 km!!!)!
host_about: Ciao! Il mio nome e' Giulia, sono un giovane avvocato e lavoro per una grande azienda. Da poco mi sono trasferita con il mio fidanzato in una casa più grande e ho deciso di affittare ai viaggiatori come me la mia prima casina nel cuore di Bologna.

name: Green refuge in the heart of Bologna
description:
A green and quiet refuge to hide in the center of Bologna.
Spacious, bright and airy apartment, recently renovated and equipped with every comfort, located on the third floor of a historic building a few steps from the train station.
host_about:
Hi, I’m Giulia and I’m from Bologna, where I live when I’m not abroad for international development projects! 
I’m always available to let my guests discover the hidden corners of my beautiful city and make their stay unforgettable!

name: Cozy apartment close to the city center
description: A cozy and quiet apartment in Cirenaica, historic and authentic neighborhood close to the city center. At guests' disposal a complete and equipped kitchen, bedroom with double bed and living area with sofa bed, a delightful terrace overlooking an internal green garden, perfect for breakfast and an aperitif.
neighborhood_overview: Cirenaica is an old neighborhood, rich of atmosphere, quiet, green, with old shops and bars. Just behind the corner you will find a famous restaurant, 'Da Vito', where you can enjoy the tasty Bolognese cuisine. In Sante Vincenzi street, close to the house, every morning there is a cheerful market with fresh fruit and vegetables, meat, cheese and ice cream. 400 meters away there is a big supermarket.

name: The light room (nella splendida via Saragozza)
description:
In the greenery and in a prestigious area, well served by shops, restaurants and transport. Walking distance to the historic center and very close to the most beautiful parks in the city.
Guests will share the spaces with me and my kids. En-suite bathroom. Linen change and cleaning upon request for stays longer than two nights.

In the beautiful setting of Via Saragozza, very welcoming and served area (typical restaurants, shops, bus), 5 minutes walking from the downtown.
My children and I live in the house.
neighborhood_overview:
The historic quarter of Bologna, that of the films of Pupi Avati...
Here Bologna is really "the red", with its roofs and its houses that cover all the shades of orange, passing through ochre and amber.
Prestigious area but with the taste of authenticity.
The green lung of the city (very suitable for those who want to walk or run) a stone's throw from the historic center.

name: Maison Giulia in San Felice 28, Bologna Downtown
description: Delightful apartment in the center of Bologna located in one of the most characteristic streets of the city (Via San Felice) full of shops, shops and restaurants. Completely renovated and furnished. Reachable quickly from the Central Station (in 15 min walk) and very close to the two Towers and Piazza Maggiore (5 min. walk). The area is well served by buses to all areas of the city (including the Fair). There is also convenient connection to the airport, paid parking a few meters away.
host_about:
Sono una mamma di due bimbi che lavora a pochi passi dall'abitazione che metto, assieme a mio marito, a disposizione degli ospiti. Sarò felice di accogliervi al vostro arrivo e, se ne avrete bisogno sarò a vostra disposizione per eventuali suggerimenti. Amo i miei bimbi, il mio lavoro, correre, viaggiare, l'aperitivo...e tante altre cose.
Spero che tutti gli ospiti possano trovare la nostra piccola casa accogliente e adatta alle proprie esigenze di viaggio!

name: Intimo appartamento a un passo dal centro
description: Intimate two-room apartment just renovated a step away from the center of Bologna, very close to the Lumière cinema and the cinema library. On the 2nd floor without elevator of a small building in old style Bologna, it is equipped with every comfort: complete and equipped kitchen, dishwasher, fridge, oven, washing machine, heating, internet with fiber and 3 workstations for smartworking, ceiling ventilation. The apartment is a 15-minute (real) walk from the station, and a 30-minute bus ride from Bologna airport and fairgrounds.
neighborhood_overview: The location is strategically close to Porta Lame and the Lumière cinema, the only one in town that screens films in the original language subtitled in Italian. On Saturday mornings (in summer it is Monday evening) in via Azzo Gardino you can take a stroll to the rediscovered market, a market of fruit, vegetables, fish and meat at km 0 where you can also eat sitting at the table. Behind the house is another small cinema (Nuovo Nosadella) inside the Borges garden that houses the neighbourhood library. In the street of the house there is a brochure with great fresh pasta and dishes to take away, as well as pizzerias, restaurants up to 250 m away on foot. Supermarket is 150m away.
host_about: Attrice di professione, mamma di 2, nata a Palermo, vive a Bologna.

name: Private room in shared apt
description:
Hello :) Private room close to the city centre and the station (15 min walk). In the room there are a coffee machine and some snacks for breakfast. Shared bathroom with the hosts.
There is no air conditioning but a fan.
The bus stop for the Fair is down the street. Kitchen not included (except for special periods/long stays, on request!) but I can suggest you many good places to eat :)
Check-in and check-out times are flexible on request.
See you in Bologna!
host_about:
Ciao! Sono Giulia e vivo a Bologna con il mio ragazzo. Anche a noi piace viaggiare, per cui facciamo di tutto per far sentire a proprio agio gli ospiti :)  
Amiamo la natura,  fare sport all'aperto e andare ai concerti. Bologna vi aspetta!

name: Pretty House In Bologna Center
description: Live your vacation in Bologna in a quiet little apartment, with views of the rooftops and in a central location.
neighborhood_overview: Central area is served by bus. Lots of places to eat or drink in the immediate vicinity. Supermarket very close
host_about:
Sono una biotecnologa e lavoro per una Biotech tedesca. Vivo a bologna dal 1995, dove mi sono trasferita per fare l'universita'. Sono originaria di Pescara, una citta' sul mare dell'Abruzzo. 
Amo leggere , andare al cinema, uscire con gli amici, sciare e viaggiare.
Sono una persona socievole e mi piace stare in compagnia.
Mi piace cucinare ed avere sempre tanti amici a cena o a pranzo.
Quando viaggio mi piace girare ed assaporare quello che fanno gli abitanti della citta' che visito. Mi piace vivere i ritmi dei posti in cui vado.
Penso che nella vita bisogna sempre avere presente cosa e' veramente importante. Sapere cosa merita preocupazioni e cosa no. Sapere che la salute e' la prima cosa e che per tutto il resto, in un modo o nell'altro, c'e' sempre rimedio.

Come live for a day inside the painting studio of an artist-designer collaborating with major international brands. You are welcome to immerse yourself in art, fashion, and design in an exclusive, welcoming, and warm atmosphere.
Central location, close to the station, and perfect for reaching any point of interest on foot in no

name: Appartamento in via Torleone
description:
Hi!
My name is Giulia and after several experiences on Airbnb as a guest I decided to launch myself on this Host adventure!

My home has been a place of collection for years, of
dinners and peace.
Anyone who came to visit me over time has always described it as a small corner of Bologna, cozy and warm.
It's not the classic apartment for short-term rentals only, in fact!
It's home for me, and somehow I hope it can be for those who pass by here.

This special place is close to everything, making it easy to plan your visit.
